          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_cebab78a089bc0bd89306f8988b6af0b2483e658</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Explaining weathering  limestone in hydrochloric acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erklären des Weatheringkalksteins in der 
Salzsäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expliquer survivant à à la pierre à chaux 
en acide chlorhydrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explicando a pedra calcária do weathering no 
ácido hydrochloric</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazione del calcare di weathering in acido 
cloridrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξήγηση του ασβεστόλιθου διάβρωσης στο υδροχλωρικό 
οξύ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explicar la piedra caliza del desgaste por la 
acción atmosférica en ácido hidroclórico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing the experiment to explain weathering in rocks. Shown here is a limestone immersed in hydrochloric acid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">limestone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die das Experiment 
zeigen, um Weathering in den Felsen zu erklären. Hier gezeigt 
ein Kalkstein, der in der Salzsäure untergetaucht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations montrant 
l'expérience pour expliquer survivre à dans les roches. 
Montrée ici est une pierre à chaux immergée dans l'acide 
chlorhydrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram a
experiência para explicar o weathering nas rochas. É mostrada 
aqui uma pedra calcária immersed no ácido hydrochloric.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano 
l'esperimento per spiegare weathering in roccie. È indicato qui
un calcare immerso in acido cloridrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν το πείραμα για 
να εξηγήσει τη διάβρωση στους βράχους. Εμφανισμένος εδώ 
είναι ένας ασβεστόλιθος που βυθίζεται στο υδροχλωρικό οξύ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran el 
experimento para explicar desgaste por la acción atmosférica en 
rocas. Se muestra aquí una piedra caliza sumergida en ácido 
hidroclórico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Salzsäure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalkstein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">roches</string>
